verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ave verum corpus natum
de Maria Virgine,
vere passum, immolatum
in cruce pro homine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cuius latus perforatum
fluxit aqua et sanguine:
esto nobis prægustatum
in mortis examine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O dulcis, o pie,
O Iesu, Fili Mariæ,
miserere mei. Amen.
